author: arfrever
msg: Fix Issue 3453: Building Subversion 1.6 requires GNU grep 2.5.
(SVN_LIB_BERKELEY_DB): Don't use the -o option of grep.

author: hwright
msg: (svn_wc_revision_status2): Make sure we allocate memory of the right size.

author: hwright
msg: Followup to r38518 by not calling the newly-deprecated function in favor
(main): Get and use a wc_ctx to call svn_wc_revision_status2().
use it when calling the new API.
(svn_client_merge_reintegrate): Generate an absolute path to call the

author: hwright
msg: Rev the svn_wc_revision_status() API to use a wc_ctx.

author: pburba
msg: On the subtree-mergeinfo branch: Fix a line ending mishap with the last sync
svnrepos.dump: When merging r38431-38504 from trunk the svn:eol-style
native property was deleted from this file (r38474) but somehow I
managed to commit the file with "\r\n" line endings.  Changing the eols
to '\r' as they are on trunk.
